20101210160241.000|20101210160243.000|CCO|LET ME TELL YOU MORE ABOUT THE 
20101210160243.000|20101210160245.000|CCO|PROBLEM WHICH THE FAA IS TRYING 
20101210160245.000|20101210160247.000|CCO|TO FIX, THOUGH IT WILL TAKE A 
20101210160247.000|20101210160249.000|CCO|COUPLE OF YEARS.
20101210160249.000|20101210160251.000|CCO|THERE ARE ABOUT 357,000 PRIVATE 
20101210160251.000|20101210160253.000|CCO|AIRCRAFT IN THE U.S. BUT THE FAA
20101210160253.000|20101210160255.000|CCO|SAYS THAT REGISTRATION RECORDS 
20101210160255.000|20101210160257.000|CCO|FOR ABOUT ONE-THIRD OF THEM, 
20101210160257.000|20101210160259.000|CCO|ABOUT 119,000 APPEAR TO BE 
20101210160259.000|20101210160301.000|CCO|INACCURATE OR OUT OF DATE.
20101210160301.000|20101210160302.667|CCO|HERE'S WHY IT'S A PROBLEM.
20101210160302.667|20101210160304.333|CCO|IT INCREASES THE POSSIBILITY 
20101210160304.333|20101210160306.000|CCO|THAT THE AIRCRAFT OR THE 
20101210160306.000|20101210160307.667|CCO|REGISTRATION NUMBERS CAN BE USED
20101210160307.667|20101210160309.333|CCO|BY DRUG TRAFFICKERS, LET'S SAY, 
20101210160309.333|20101210160311.000|CCO|OR EVEN TERRORISTS, AND WILL NOT
20101210160311.000|20101210160312.667|CCO|BE DETECTED BY LAW ENFORCEMENT.
20101210160312.667|20101210160314.333|CCO|LET ME GIVE YOU AN EXAMPLE.
20101210160314.333|20101210160316.000|CCO|WHEN AN AIRCRAFT ENTERS 
20101210160316.000|20101210160317.667|CCO|RESTRICTED AIR SPACE HERE IN 
20101210160317.667|20101210160319.333|CCO|WASHINGTON, ONE OF THE FIRST 
20101210160319.333|20101210160321.000|CCO|THINGS AUTHORITIES DO IS RUN THE
20101210160321.000|20101210160323.000|CCO|TAIL NUMBER TO GET THE OWNER'S 
20101210160323.000|20101210160325.000|CCO|NAME.
20101210160325.000|20101210160327.000|CCO|DOESN'T NECESSARILY TELL YOU WHO
20101210160327.000|20101210160329.000|CCO|IS FLYING THE PLANE BUT GIVES 
20101210160329.000|20101210160331.000|CCO|YOU SOMETHING TO WORK WITH.
20101210160331.000|20101210160332.429|CCO|IF THE REGISTRATION ISN'T 
20101210160332.429|20101210160333.857|CCO|ACCURATE, THEY CAN'T DETERMINE 
20101210160333.857|20101210160335.286|CCO|WHO THEY ARE DEALING WITH.
20101210160335.286|20101210160336.714|CCO|THAT'S WHY THE EFFORT TO GET THE
20101210160336.714|20101210160338.143|CCO|REGISTRATIONS UP TO DATE.
20101210160338.143|20101210160339.571|CCO|>> JEAN, YOU SAID IT COULD TAKE 
20101210160339.571|20101210160341.000|CCO|A FEW YEARS.
20101210160341.000|20101210160343.500|CCO|HOW BIG A PROBLEM IS CORRECTING 
20101210160343.500|20101210160346.000|CCO|IT?
20101210160346.000|20101210160348.500|CCO|>> Reporter: WELL, UNTIL NOW, 
20101210160348.500|20101210160351.000|CCO|OWNERS HAVE ONLY HAD TO REGISTER
20101210160351.000|20101210160352.250|CCO|THEIR AIRCRAFT ONCE, AT THE TIME
20101210160352.250|20101210160353.500|CCO|OF PURCHASE.
20101210160353.500|20101210160354.750|CCO|THEY HAVE TO REPORT CHANGES, THE
20101210160354.750|20101210160356.000|CCO|SALE OF AN AIRCRAFT OR 
20101210160356.000|20101210160357.250|CCO|SCRAPPING.
20101210160357.250|20101210160358.500|CCO|A LOT HAVEN'T BEEN DOING IT, SO 
20101210160358.500|20101210160359.750|CCO|A LARGE NUMBER OF THE RECORDS 
20101210160359.750|20101210160401.000|CCO|ARE OUT OF DATE.

20101210160403.500|20101210160406.000|CCO|RULE REQUIRING ALL CIVIL 
20101210160406.000|20101210160408.500|CCO|AIRCRAFT TO BE REREGISTERED OVER

20101210160411.000|20101210160413.000|CCO|THAT, OWNERS HAVE TO RENEW THE 
20101210160413.000|20101210160415.000|CCO|REGISTRATION EVERY THREE YEARS 
20101210160415.000|20101210160417.000|CCO|COMPARABLE TO WHAT WE DO WITH 
20101210160417.000|20101210160419.000|CCO|CARS.

20101210160706.000|20101210160707.667|CCO|ABOUT.
20101210160707.667|20101210160709.333|CCO|WAS HE SANE WHEN HE COMMITTED 
20101210160709.333|20101210160711.000|CCO|THE CRIMES OR WAS HE SO UNDER 
20101210160711.000|20101210160712.667|CCO|THIS SORT OF THE MENTAL ILLNESS 
20101210160712.667|20101210160714.333|CCO|THAT WAS SO SEVERE THAT HE
